citation.article-title: Kibdelosporangium philippinense sp. nov. isolated from soil

p.s: Description of Kibdelosporangium philippinense sp. nov.
Kibdelosporangium philippinense (Phil. ip. pi. nenâ€™. se. M.L. adj. philippinense, pertaining to the Philippines)
Cells are aerobic, gram positive, non-acid fast, nonmotile, filamentous, and differentiated into substrate and aerial mycelia.
The type strain is strain A80407 (= NRRL 18198).
It was isolated from soil collected in the Philippines.
The species description is based on a single strain and thus serves as the type strain description.
